result.purpose: Responsible for defining various HTTP clients for interacting with different services and managing device-related operations.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file defines a specific client or interface for handling HTTP requests related to different services.

httpclient/athena.go.purpose: Defines an HTTP client for linking accounts with Athena service.

httpclient/device.go.purpose: Defines a DeviceClient interface and its implementation for managing device-related operations via HTTP requests.

httpclient/internal_client.go.purpose: Implements an internal HTTP client with HMAC authentication for secure API requests.

httpclient/mercury.go.purpose: Implements a MercuryClient for sending notifications via HTTP.

httpclient/tracking.go.purpose: This file implements a tracking client for sending tracking data to a specified URL using HTTP requests.
